chapter.title: (Reports) Module
chapter.para: The is the cross-product central module of enabling you, as a user at a client, to see consolidated lists of transactions from all modules.

section.title: Overview
section.para: This module contains no functions for creating or amending transactions. It contains functions similar to those in other modules, for listing existing transactions and their details. Whereas each other module shows only transactions for the product that that module handles, this module shows transactions for all products.
Click Reports on the main menu on your home page to get to the menu.

section.title: Functions
section.para: All the functions in this module handle products of all types, that is, they show products from every module.
The functions in this module are:

listitem.para: Function to display a list of your company's pending transactions; that is, those that are have Draft or Unsigned status, and those that have been submitted to the bank but have not yet been acknowledged by them. From this list, you can open those that have Draft or Unsigned status to edit or submit them. This takes you to the appropriate pagein the module for the appropriate product.

If you have appropriate permission in your profile, submit multiple records to the bank in a single operation. A check box appears by each record in the list, and a button at the end of the screen submits the selected records.

Function to display a list of your company's files (that is, the set of transactions on one instance of a product) for all types of product, so you can view their details or history, and optionally print a hard copy of their details.
Execute a report, designed by an authorized administrator.

section.title: Pending Transactions
section.para: Check the status of pending transactions, and optionally edit or submit them.
This function is the same as described in section Pending in chapter Functions, except that it shows transactions for all products.

section.title: Batch Submission
section.para: Submit multiple records for multiple products.
This function displays a list of all unsigned transactions, for all products.
If you have sufficient authorisation in your profile, you can submit multiple records in a single operation. Click rows to select them, then click the button at the end of the list to submit them.

section.title: Inquiry
section.para: Check the status, details and history of products
This function is the same as described in section Inquiry in chapter Functions, except that it shows products of all types.

section.title: Report Execution
section.para: Execute a report designed by an authorized administrator.
This function displays a list of existing reports.

Click the link to display the selected report. The report may include search criteria fields, so that you can enter search patterns. You can also select the output format: Screen, CSV export, SpreadSheet (Excel) export or PDF export. Click Search to execute the report.
